metadata.name: GLITCH/KOREA
metadata.description:
This NFT has been designed to celebrate the GLITCH/KOREA event and represent the enthusiasm and determination of all the participants.

GLITCH/KOREA event, which took place alongside a Web3 conference, marked the inaugural multi-chain hackathon in Korea with a specific focus on Web3 technology.

Owning this NFT indicates being associated with Glitch and sharing their goal of promoting the widespread mass adoption of the Web3 ecosystem.
